title: Folder, "Burroughs", 1984
dimensions:
29 x 22.7 cm (11 1/2 x 9 in.), closed
29 x 45.7 cm ( 11 1/2 x 18 in.), opened
22.5 x 10 cm (9 x 4 in.), flap
creditline: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
description: The object is composed of yellow-orange glossy cardboard. Recto: In the top quarter, Burroughs, in a serif style type, is imprinted across. A digitally styled map excerpt in the shape of a flying flag is imprinted in black and white just above the last three letters of the company name. Just below the last two letters, serving/ Government/ Worldwide is imprinted in small serif style capitals. Inside - Near the top right edge of the right hand flap, the cover design is repeated in a smaller size font.
